title: Mingjia ‘Jacky’ Guan
text: Dynamic and trilingual Data Scientist with strong analytical thinking, avid communication skills, experience in team projects, able to quickly grasp new concepts, and experience working reliably under pressure as well as against the clock. Incoming ML Engineer/Data Scientist @Deledao, DevOps Engineer @Sunregen Healthcare AG and here to make impactful contributions towards society.
